metadata.description: Size of VMs in the VM Scale Set.
The source of the blob storage containing the custom image.

String used as a base for naming resources. Must be 3-61 characters in length and globally unique across Azure. A hash is prepended to this string for some resources, and resource-specific information is appended.
Number of VM instances (100 or less).

Subnet information in which VMSS to be deployed. Put id in format as - /subscriptions/YourSubscriptionId/resourceGroups/YourVNETResourceGroupName/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/YourVNETName/subnets/YourSubnetName
The id of the already pre-created public IP address. This can be obtained from Azure Portal. Create a static public IP and use its Id here.
